info.description: Enable people to store spots on public and private maps
info.title: uebermaps API endpoints

patch.description: Update account. Wrap map parameters in [user].

description.example: This photo was taken in front of the restaurant
Landed here by accident but look how wonderful this place is in the photos attached

title.example: Beautiful place out in the country

post.description: Sign in user. Wrap authentication parameters in [user].

200.description: Contains user data including authentication token for subsequent requests

get.description: List your collaborator invitations.

description.example: A collection of restaurants, cafes, clubs and random spots that I recommend in Berlin

post.description: Invite user to collaborate on map.

description.example: A collection of restaurants, cafes, clubs and random spots that I recommend in Berlin

post.summary: Invite user to collaborate on map

requestBody.description: Supply map_id and either a comma separated list of user_ids or emails. Optionally you can provide a 'is_admin' parameter with 'true' or 'false' to give the invited users admin privileges.

description.example: A collection of restaurants, cafes, clubs and random spots that I recommend in Berlin

get.description: Show collaborator invitation

description.example: A collection of restaurants, cafes, clubs and random spots that I recommend in Berlin
A collection of restaurants, cafes, clubs and random spots that I recommend in Berlin

patch.description: Update comment. Wrap comment parameters in [comment].

get.description: List your own events.

parameters.description: Begin of time range of event (ISO 8601 date format).
parameters.name: timeframe_start

parameters.description: End of time range of event (ISO 8601 date format).
parameters.name: timeframe_end

parameters.description: To refine your event index request to contain only events within                                                             a geographical box pass the followng bounds parameters.                                                             F. e. to get events within 'Hamburg, St. Pauli':                                                             bounds[sw_lat]=53.54831449741324                                                             bounds[sw_lon]=9.943227767944336                                                             bounds[ne_lat]=53.5571103674878                                                             bounds[ne_lon]=9.9776029586792
parameters.name: bounds

get.description: List your own maps.

post.description: Create map. Wrap map parameters in [map]. To add a map header picture pass a base64 encoded string to [map][picture].

get.description: Search maps

parameters.description: Distance. Diameter of search radius in meter (default: 2000 meter)
parameters.name: d

parameters.description: Latitude for search radius (default distance: 2000 meter)
parameters.name: lat

parameters.description: Longitude for search radius (default distance: 2000 meter)
parameters.name: lon

get.description: Get secret access token of an uebermap with access set to 'Secret link'. Pass the 'token' on every request you make to access this uebermap and its resources. F.e. token=1-x_gqu7eLBe3uKoAGAGXy

200.description: Contains map data and a secret token to access this map.
